New Records: Luis Gil allowed a career-high four homers
Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm hit a solo shot in the bottom of the fifth
David Bednar set Jazz Chisholm down on three pitches with the bases loaded and two outs
Yasmani Grandal homered and finished 3-for-4 with three RBI
Pre-Game Insights: Two of the Rookie of the Year candidates in each league, Luis Gil and Paul Skenes, pitched in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge was shut down by Pittsburgh's pitching staff, going 0-for-5 with five strikeouts
Luis Gil struggled in his last two outings, allowing 10 earned runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game featured two of the Rookie of the Year candidates in each league
Jazz Chisholm finished a strong day at the plate 2-for-4 with two runs driven in
Others: Upcoming schedule: Clarke Schmidt takes the mound against Bailey Falter on Sunday
